title: Lip Sync Battle
brief_description: Each episode features two A-list celebrities like you’ve never seen them before - syncing their hearts out in hysterically epic performances. Hosted by LL Cool J with colorful commentary by social media maven and supermodel co-host, Chrissy Teigen. The mic is off, the battle is on!

constellations_other.name: Voice and the moving image
constellations_other.description: Sound changed cinema, but it wasn't always welcome, but it hasn't stopped people aspiring for the spotlight.
